article_title: Obama Should Call ISIS’ Actions Against Christians ‘Genocide’
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

Email address

article_metadata.description: President Barack Obama still has not classified ISIS’ actions against Christians and others in the Middle East as “genocide.” What else needs to come to light?
